meta.note: Official stream leads from 2025 Stream Leads and Roadmap by Stream confluence page

AI_Foundation.description: AI-powered chatbot systems for knowledge and analytics

Analytics_Platform_Workspaces.description: Analytics platform containing Studio, workspace types, and HCP365 signal system

Audience_Management.description: Everything that can be found in the Segment Management platform

Campaign_Management.description: All things Campaign Setup/Management: Camp. setup, bulk edit, tactic debugger, Creatives, etc

Creatives.description: All things Creatives: Uploads, Scheduling, Bulk Editing, Creative Library, etc

Deal_Platform.description: All Things Deals/PMP: Deals Marketplace, PMP Mgmt/Targeting, deal debugger, Groups, etc

Forecasting.description: Section within Campaign Management, Forecast API

Identity_Targeting.description: Identity Vendors (Liveramp, ID5, UID2.0…) and targeting functionality

List_Management.description: List management functionality and the NPI List API

Omnichannel.description: The process of populating Search, Social, EHR platforms with PP audiences

Optimization.description: Includes items such as AO, CPA, CPC, and Sequential messaging

Personalization.description: Site Optimization and DCO via the personalization API a.k.a. Genome

Platform_Administration.description: Everything that can be found under the Administration menu in the platform

Platform_Compliance.description: Management of functionality such as 2FA and data compliance, for example GDPR and CCPA

Reporting.description: Everything within the report builder platforms (Life and Signal)

Supply.description: Supply Stream – All Things Supply: Supply quality/IVT mitigation, supply intelligence/optimization (i.e. supply-side signal ingestion, supply prioritization), supply targeting (Endemic toggle, Curated Markets)

Tag_Management.description: The consolidation of collection tags with Smart, conversion, and retargeting pixels under one platform

Third_Party_Data_Partnerships.description: Examples include, IVT detection (Human, DV), demographics (Acxiom), onboarders and vendors
